page.title: 13Churches-Malpas and Bettws
page.content:
{The churches in Malpas}are- St.Mary's Church in Wales,built 1815. St.James Church in Wales,built 1893. Malpas Road Evangelical Church,a free independent church,built 1897. All Saints Church in Wales,built 1898. Graig Park Gospel Hall,built 1930's. St.Anne's Roman Catholic Church,1959. Crindau Gospel Hall built before 1930. Trinity Presbyterian Church,built 1961 { {The churches in Bettws}are- St.Davids Church in Wales founded 1400 Bettws Free Church,a United Reformed Church built on the estate in 1964. St.David Lewis Roman Catholic-1968.
The Church in Wales churches,except St.James,are built in stone.All the others are brick and glass.Roofs are slate or felt over timber. Gareth Davies.4A
